root.name: Super Daisenryaku
root.description: OverviewSuper Daisenryaku is a military strategy war game and the follow up to SystemSoft's Daisenryaku. Like its predecessor, it was first released on Japanese home computers by SystemSoft, though would eventually be ported to consoles of the era by SystemSoft's "Alpha" branch. In Super Daisenryaku's case, this included the Sega Genesis (on which it was the first game that was developed by a third-party developer) and the Turbografx-CD with enhanced sound and image quality.
